title: 19. Do Your Doctor’s Political Views Affect Your Care?
description: Since doctors are human, they bring their own beliefs and preferences into the examination room. But they’ve also taken an oath to act in the best interest of all patients. What happens when politics and medicine collide?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Since doctors are human, they bring their own beliefs and preferences into the examination room. But they’ve also taken an oath to act in the best interest of all patients. What happens when politics and medicine collide?
